maha banku warthawe penwana sankhyalekhana samaharak wikruthi kirim hatiyata owun pa්rasiddhiyema chodana nangamin karunu idiripath kara atha. 2016 maha banku warthawa nikuth wimen pasuwa dinapatha aarthika puwath palakerena puwathpathak magin kara athi helidarawwa anuwa, aarthika wardhana wegaya ganan balima sandaha sawadya sankhyathmaka daththa upayogi karagena thibena bawath ee anuwa maha banku warthawen niwaradi swarupaya pilimbaibu nowana bawath penwa di atha. 2017 mayi 16 wana dina kara athi ema helidarawwa anuwa 2016 wasara sandaha aarthika wardhana anupathaya hatiyata penwa di athi 4.4% waradi bawath eya niwaradiwa gananaya kala wita ema pa්ramanaya 2.2% k bawath sankhyalekhana thorathuru padanam karagena oppukara atha.

wishwa widyala prathipadana komisame sabhapathi mahacharya mohanda silwa mahatha…usas pela samathwu daruwan ised skor agayan matha wishwa widyalayata illum kala pasu bandawa ganim apa karanawa.ised skor agayan sakas karanne adhyapana amathyanshaya.sisuwek ho sisuwiyak wishwa widyalayata illum kirimedi sathyaya thorathuru labadiya yuthuyi.ehi waradak athnam ee sambandhawa apata kriyathmaka wiya hakiyi.shreshtadhikaranaya ho adhyapana amathyanshaya apata kiyanawa nam yam ayek wibhagayata penisita aththe wanchakari lesa kiyala apita puluwan ee gana awadhanaya yomukaranna.kawurun ho chodana kala pamanin sudusukam sapiru lamayeku wishwa widyalayata bandawa nogena inna baha.meka sulupatu karanayak nowe.parikshanaya kalayak gathawana pulul ekak.dushkara pradeshawala daruwange wishwa widyala warama kawurun ho kolla kanawa nam eekata watak bandiya yuthuyi.mehidi wada wadagath wanne sanwedi wimata wada prashnaya niwaradiwa handunagena mewani de yali nowimata athi ida sakasimayi.

agamathiwarayeku sahitha amathya mandalayak path kirimen pasuwa paramadhipathyaya himi janathawage widhayaka balaya ki්rayathmaka kirimata balawarama laba nawa janadhipathiwarayeku path wuwada sanshodhitha aanduka්rama wyawastha widhiwidhana anuwa nawa agamathiwarayeku sahitha amathya mandalayak path kirimata warthamana 48(2) wyawasthawa anuuwa ethumata balayak natha.
